FuncDef:
The assistant command creates a maintenance assistant or displays a maintenance assistant view.
The undo assistant command cancels the configuration. The assistant command creates a maintenance assistant or displays a maintenance assistant view. The undo assistant command cancels the configuration. By default, no maintenance assistant is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a maintenance assistant.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 characters starting with letters and containing only underlines (_), letters, and numbers.
The value is case-sensitive when being configured for the first time and becomes case-insensitive during subsequent access or quotation.

ExtraInfo: To configure a triggering condition and a working task, run the assistant command. When the working condition is met, the system automatically runs the commands in the command line file.
